mapper.insert: insert into t_notice ( notice_desc, notice_file_path, disp_yn, board_seq, ins_seq, ins_dt, upt_seq, upt_dt ) values ( #{noticeDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noticeFilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dispYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{boardSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{insSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, now(), #{insSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, now() )
mapper.update: update t_notice set notice_desc = #{noticeDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notice_file_path = #{noticeFilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, disp_yn = #{dispYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, board_seq = #{boardSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, upt_seq = #{uptSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, upt_dt = now() where notice_seq = #{noticeSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}
